body.name: DAVID ARCHY Mens Underwear Bamboo Rayon Boxer Briefs Breathable Soft Moisture-Wicking with Fly Underwear for Men Multipack

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Fabric type 95% Rayon Made from Bamboo & 5% Spandex

BAMBOO RAYON MENS UNDERWEAR: Rayon made from bamboo material fabric, its properties of moisture-wicking and temperature-regulating are determined our mens boxer briefs feel soft and cool against the skin even on the hottest days, ensuring maximum comfort and breathability.
MENS BOXER BRIEFS FEATURES: The functional fly feature protects your dignity while the mid-rise waistband fits comfortably around your hips. Avoiding uncomfortable wedgies and chafing.

PERFECT FIT & DURABLE: With no riding up legs, our mens underwear boxer briefs stay in place all day long without bunching up or sagging. You'll feel confident and secure from dawn until dusk. Even after numerous washing and drying, the high-quality fabric retains its elasticity and durability.
GENTLE ON SENSITIVE SKIN: Say goodbye to irritating tags and uncomfortable seams. Our tagless and friction-free design ensures you'll never have to deal with painful rubbing and itching again.

ECO-FRIENDLY CERTIFIED MENS UNDERWEAR: Rayon made from sustainable bamboo material fabric, our boxer briefs are not only stylish and comfortable but also environmentally responsible. Upgrade your wardrobe today by contributing to the environmental protection.
3D ROOMY U-POUCH: Ultra U-pouch design, providing more space for men's private area free from extrusion or constraints. Makes you more confident and sexy wearing our mens big pouch underwear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m retirement age and gave up tighty whities years ago. I may be old but I’m not dead. I keep physically fit and exercise regularly. 6 foot, 200# steady. Order a medium. With that out of the way the fit is the best I’ve ever had, ever! Supportive, trim, not bunchy under well fitting pants. Pleasantly surprised with the bamboo fabric. They are cool when they need to be cool and warm when they need to be warm. I live in the north country and even on mornings already at 20 degrees this year I wasn’t suffering from major cold shrinkage! I have two other types of DA underwear and they are great in warmer climates or summer but these have been the best fit and most comfortable so far. Where were these when I was younger?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used a local midwest company, Duluth Trading, underwear for many, many years and never thought to look anywhere else. Durability-wise, that company was and is top notch. Price-wise, super expensive.. but they last forever. Literally the only problem I had was always being hot and sweaty all the time. I couldn’t find a solution with them, so I started to look on Amazon and saw the reviews on this pair of underwear.I love the designed pouch for support and keeping “everything” separated from your legs, it’s supportive but free feeling at the same time, I’m not sure how else to explain that. If you buy them, you’ll know what I mean. That’s a big thing for me to keep from sticking to your legs and not feel tight in the pouch area. It took a little getting used to since they’re a fairly tight-to-skin boxer brief style, but they have quite a bit of elasticity. The band on top isn’t tight and actually I would like a tiny bit more tightness with that so it doesn’t ride down.. and I’m not a big person by any means. I’m 6’0” 190lbs and I got a size Large. It’s not unmanageable and maybe it’s just me getting used to them vs the other Duluth Trading kind.The feel is great, they feel like you’re almost wearing nothing which is the feel I was going for. They look great, obviously with the pouch in the front it creates a little extra emphasis on your goods, my wife commented on that right away.Lastly, whatever they’re made out of is extremely breathable. The main reason for my search of new underwear… I don’t feel like these are retaining any heat. They don’t cool by any means, but they are breathable and let go of your body heat with ease!Never in my life have I written about underwear, especially in such detail! This is worth it. I hope it helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fine, but two suggestions to improve
reviews.reviewText: I got these after searching for boxer briefs with a pouch that don't break the bank. To be transparent, I just got them yesterday and washed and wore immediately, so I can't speak to long-term wear. But that's not my attempt here. I don't think I need to own a particular boxer brief for a long time to know what I like/dislike.So, here goes: These are probably the best you can do at this price point, but I there are two areas in which they could greatly improve.1. The waistband is "fine," but I wish it were about a quarter-inch wider. The band is on par with mass-market underwear bands. Nice, smooth finish, but not super-stretchy and thin enough that it feels less secure in place.2. The pouch could be bigger. I'm not constricted as if wearing a jockstrap, but I would say brands like BN3TH and Saxx have pouches that are bigger and therefore better for me. If you need that kind of room to hold the boys, go those routes. If you don't, then David Archy will be fine.Everything else about these is...fine. The material is soft and stretchy and feels nice. The leg openings, despite what it says in the listing, DO roll upward, and this is after wearing literally just a few hours.For me, these will be relegated to the back of the underwear drawer and used on laundry day or maybe when I'm doing yard work or doing a light workout and want a little support but not wearing actual athletic clothing. If my two suggestions are ever implemented in the product, I will certainly buy more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Soft, Very Flexible, Will Make your manhood look huge
reviews.reviewText: These are wonderful, they are very soft and almost like a stretchy cotton. Stay dry all day. The way the junk pocket is sewn together, it will make your manhood appear to be much bigger than with other similar products. You will be very happy with them, so just order them and you will thank me later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breathable is the way to go
reviews.reviewText: I have been purchasing these boxer briefs for a few years. Huge fan!! Super comfortable, long lasting and very breathable. I work long hours in a stuffy location, and these have been a savior of sorts. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's as if my nether regions had entered a heretofore unknown realm of comfortable bliss
reviews.reviewText: When I slipped into these majestic unmentionables, I wondered whether my arduous journey to find my ideal pair of hip huggers had finally come to an end.The fabric was softer than a marshmallow at a poetry slam, providing a caress that only the most skilled of tailors could achieve.The fit? Impeccable. Like a perfectly executed magic trick, these undies managed to accentuate my assets while cleverly perking up any flabby distractions. It was as if they were whispering, "Behold, the master of disguise" (and inevitable disappointment).The grays and blue colours have an understated rich, velvety quality – making you the connoisseur of cool under your outer layers.So, if you seek an undergarment that's utilitarian, fairly priced and puts comfort above all, let your undercarriage revel in the glory of these. Until next prime day, may your danglers be dry, and your spirits high.

reviews.reviewTitle: great leg length and they stay in place
reviews.reviewText: soft, comfortable, wear well, legs don't ride up

These underwear are so soft, comfortable, durable, well-made with quality materials and easy to wash -- they can even go in the dryer at a low setting without shrinking or damage. LOVE them and highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Exactly as shown & very nice quality
reviews.reviewText: Best underwear I've ever owned . Fits great, stretches & holds shape, super comfortable & breathable .
